name: Time Keepers
description:
In the year 2067, time travel has become possible…and quite problematic. Time criminals from the past have discovered ways to wreak havoc in the present, committing the most heinous crimes-from abductions to murder. Enter the the time police, and our fearless hero, scientist Jonathan Swift. He’s a quantum physicist with a penchant for justice. Your mission: help him find the clues left by the criminal in the current timeline. Then choose the destination timeline and find the missing person or the weapon of choice.

Pay close attention to the number of portals you have at your disposal, too many jump s might cause you to lose the game. 

Don't worry though, you can replay every game by re-using the case number!
